    namespace   = "my-namespace"
    description = "Read-only access role for namespace resources"
    role_type   = "CUSTOM"

      resource   = "origin_pool"
      operations = ["read", "list"]

# f5distributedcloud_namespace_role (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_namespace_role` resource manages Namespace Roles in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Namespace Roles define permissions within a namespace, allowing fine-grained access control for resources and operations.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_namespace_role" "viewer" {
  name        = "viewer-role"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Read-only access role for namespace resources"
  role_type   = "CUSTOM"

  permissions {
    resource   = "origin_pool"
    operations = ["read", "list"]
  }

  permissions {
    resource   = "http_loadbalancer"
    operations = ["read", "list"]
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `permissions` (Block List) Permission definitions for the namespace role. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--permissions))
- `role_type` (String) Type of namespace role (CUSTOM, PREDEFINED).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--permissions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `permissions`

Required:

- `operations` (List of String) Operations allowed (read, write, delete, list).
- `resource` (String) Resource type to grant permissions on within the namespace.
